spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct, but door orientations in the lobby and bedroom-1 areas deviate from the plan. Window placement on the top-left section is simplified compared to the plan's openings.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thicknesses are mostly consistent. However, the external balcony/deck areas are significantly simplified, missing the defined railing/boundary wall details seen in the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Highly accurate placement and scaling of furniture assets, including the specific rug orientation and dining set configuration.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent rendering quality with soft shadows and clean geometry. The orthographic-leaning perspective provides high visual clarity.

detected_errors.description: Swing orientation of the main entrance door and internal doors (e.g., Bedroom-1) does not match the 2D plan.
The balcony/deck boundaries are simplified and lack the specific structural offsets shown in the original blueprint.
Rendering artifact or simplification: The utility/kitchen wall partition appears slightly merged or non-standard compared to the defined blueprint lines.
